entry.title: Play around with Django
entry.content:
Worked on a simple repo recently, which is a diary site using Django-nonreal wich can use google app engine authentication.

GitHub: https://github.com/GoSteven/Diary

Django-nonreal contain all the major functionalities of Django which can host pure Django application on google application. It just works awesome!

entry.title: Setting up octopress blog on GitHub
entry.content:
After install tons of things on my Mac and setting the DNS of the GoSteven.com domain, it finally works for me.

I am not going to migrate my old blog post here, as those are mostly code snippets. Visit Steven's Dev Blog in case you are interested.
